name: American Farm Tractor Race
description:
Hop onto the driving seat of a heavy Farm Tractor, get on the American race tracks and win every race challenge coming your way. This is a classic American crops farming simulator that lets you enjoy being a heavy speed driver on a championship tractor competing in real farm sports.

OXO Games Studio brings you another speed racing jewel with this American Farm Tractor Race, a classic farm sports simulator. Choose your favorite racing game mode and get on the race tracks while enjoying real heavy tractor simulation in 3D. Play now and become an expert race driver.

FEATURES:
• A real 3D farm tractor simulation
• Different challenging race modes
• Race in circuit race track or time-beat race track
• Multiple Tractors to choose for your farm championship
• Punch the boost button to speed up your heavy vehicle
• Easy and smooth race controls
• Real-time scoring and position system in gameplay
• Amazing HD Graphics
• Free to play forever
• Sports music and sound effects
• No In-App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…

JOIN US ON SOCIAL NETWORKS:

WE LOVE TO HEAR:

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR CUSTOMERS:
* This is free game especially for Sports, Tractors, Farm, Racing and Simulation game lovers but it contains third party ads.
